extDescription.message: Find all links in the page selection and open them in new tabs

contextMenuOpenLinks.description: Context menu item to open links

contextMenuCopyLinks.description: Context menu item to copy links

noTextSelected.message: No text selected. Please select a portion of the page that contains links.
noTextSelected.description: Message when no text is selected

noLinksFound.description: Message when no links are found in selection

noValidLinksFound.message: No valid links found in selection.
noValidLinksFound.description: Message when no valid links are found in selection
